nodes.text: A pair of male Kajain'sa'Niktos were members of Kidd Kareen's Podracer crew around 22 BBY. They and the rest of Kareen's crew agreed with San Maxus to start helping the Separatists and Count Dooku in order to make enough money to retire from podracing all together. While working on Mon Gazza the Niktos aided Maxus and the other mechanics in fending off the undercover Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker, as Skywalker had been snooping around Kidd Kareen's pit looking for Separatist contraband. Kareen arrived shortly after the fight began and broke it up. Later Skywalker again confronted Maxus as he was making a pitstop during the Mon Gazza Maze, in attempt to grab Republic intel from Maxus who was going to sell it to Asajj Ventress. Maxus escaped, leaving Skywalker to face the Niktos and the rest of the crew yet again. Anakin was able to dispatch some of the mechanics with debris, including one of the Niktos, but left to pursue his Padawan Ahsoka Tano, who was podracing. This left the clone trooper Rex and the droid R2-D2 to fend off the remaining mechanics and Nikto. Later, Kareen indicated that after it all only Maxus had been retired from the crew after being killed by Ahsoka Tano. Kareen in fact offered Tano to take a job as a replacement for Maxus, but Tano refused.
